snippet: Seattle’s fast, physical defense smothered Peyton Manning and the Broncos at MetLife Stadium as the Seahawks romped to their first Super Bowl title.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks overwhelm Denver Broncos, 43-8, shattering expectations as they clinch their first Super Bowl title; Seattle's physical defense smothers quarterback Peyton Manning and the Broncos, forcing Denver into bad decisions and turnovers.
lead_paragraph: Seattle’s fast, physical defense smothered Peyton Manning and the Broncos at MetLife Stadium as the Seahawks romped to their first Super Bowl title.

headline.main: Forget Forecast: Seahawks Pour It On in the Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Forget Forecast: Seahawks Pour It On
